title: Officers save family from frigid crash in Naperville, IL | Video | wsiltv.com
text: Officers save family from frigid crash in Naperville, IL Weather Alert ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT CST FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...South to southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southern Illinois and southeast Missouri. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to midnight CST Friday night. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Wet ground may result in some trees being uprooted, and tree limbs will be blown down. Power outages are possible. High profile vehicles will have difficulty. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A corridor of stronger winds, with gusts up to 60 mph is possible just to the east of the Advisory region. If that begins to appear likely, a high wind warning will be issued. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. && Currently in Carterville 52°F Partly Cloudy 54°F / 34°F 5 PM 50°F 6 PM 48°F 7 PM 46°F 8 PM 44°F 9 PM 44°F Online Poll [ What are your New Year's Goals?](/what-are-your-new-years-goals/poll_57627a66-a804-11ee-a606-ef114dc66bf3.html) 2024 is here! With a new year comes new goals, what is your biggest goal?
